dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7184 IH: To amend the West Los Angeles Leasing Act of 2016 with respect to the definition of land use revenue.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lieu (for himself, Ms. Brownley, and Mr. Sherman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the West Los Angeles Leasing Act of 2016 with respect to the definition of land use revenue.

section.header: Definition of land use revenue under West Los Angeles Leasing Act of 2016
section.text: Section 2(d)(2) of the West Los Angeles Leasing Act of 2016 (Public Law 114–226) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking ; and and inserting a semicolon;
by redesignating subparagraph (B) as subparagraph (C); and
by inserting after subparagraph (A) the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: any funds received as compensation for an easement described in subsection (e); and
